short_definition: A formal written document accusing a person or persons named of having committed a felony or misdemeanor, lawfully presented by the prosecuting attorney for their action upon it.
long_definition_html: A formal written document accusing a person or persons named of having committed a felony or misdemeanor, lawfully presented by the prosecuting attorney for their action upon it.
long_definition_markdown: A formal written document accusing a person or persons named of having committed a felony or misdemeanor, lawfully presented by the prosecuting attorney for their action upon it.
long_definition_text: A formal written document accusing a person or persons named of having committed a felony or misdemeanor, lawfully presented by the prosecuting attorney for their action upon it.
